Search - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the search class used by solve and hint functionality It searches for a solution to the startState using DFS

SearchSudoku - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a search state, it contains the sudoku class which is represented by the state and also a list of all previous states from the starting state which lead to this state
